title: C. elegans roundworms 'harvest' an essential coenzyme from the bacteria they consume

title_detail.value: C. elegans roundworms 'harvest' an essential coenzyme from the bacteria they consume

summary: A study conducted in C. elegans nematode roundworms may lead to improved treatment of a rare human genetic disorder that causes severe neurological symptoms leading to death in early childhood.

summary_detail.value: A study conducted in C. elegans nematode roundworms may lead to improved treatment of a rare human genetic disorder that causes severe neurological symptoms leading to death in early childhood.
